attributes.action: Recognize Taiwan is a part of China.
attributes.background: As everyone knows Taiwan is belong to China. But nowadays some malicious organizations are trying to split Taiwan and China. I have to claim that Taiwan is always a part of China!!!! So I hope the government could  recognize Taiwan as a part of China.

rejection.details:
The UK Government does not recognise Taiwan as a state and has no diplomatic relations with Taiwan, so it is not clear what action your petition is asking for. 

You might be interested in this answer to a parliamentary question, which sets out the Government's position:

http://www.publications.parliament.uk/pa/ld201011/ldhansrd/text/111219w0002.htm#11121924000858
